sentence: The Republican Party is embroiled in a minor internal tiff over three words: legitimate political discourse.? The awkward coinage appeared in a Republican National Committee resolution censuring Liz Cheney and Adam Kinzinger for investigating Donald Trump's efforts to negate the election results.
title: Abbreviated Pundit Roundup: Canadian protest is more truck than truckers
